message_1: A cryptographic hash function generates a fixed-size output that is unique to the input message. Suppose you have a message of length 256 bits and you want to generate a hash value using SHA-256 cryptographic hash function. What will be the length of the hash value generated by SHA-256?
message_2: The length of the hash value generated by the SHA-256 cryptographic hash function is always 256 bits, regardless of the input message size.
